basic_info.description: Hello, my name is Melo and I also go by Melodic. I am a software developer with a background in small business.  I ventured into the dynamic realm of Software Development driven by my passion for technology, a thirst for learning, and a curiosity for unraveling how things work. I love absorbing new concepts, skills, and ideas. Stepping up my game, I've embarked on a journey to immerse myself in the Software Development field. My mission is to not only enhance my skill set but also to discover innovative ways to deliver added value to clients in business through the fusion of my software development expertise. Exploration has its unpredictable paths, and as I dive deeper into Software Development, my trajectory may evolve, much like the technology we use in our daily life. My hands-on leadership experience in small business has instilled the autonomy required to accomplish tasks without constant oversight. I have a knack for planning, strategic direction, and a disciplined time management approach to ensure my projects receive the dedicated focus they deserve. Today, my sights are set on a single goal: to accumulate profound Software Development knowledge which will mold my path as new possibilities emerge. I'm excited to see where my software development expertise will expand into.

projects.description: WWYR  is a personalized movie recommendation web-based hub that allows users to receive movie suggestions from people they know and trust.
